name: Thane
appearance: A well-combed man with river-limestone eyes, a tide-clock brooch, and meticulous bead-knots in his hair. His gloves are eel-skin, inkless but never idle.
character: Polished and calculating, he wears courtesy like armor and thinks three ledgers ahead.
talents: Photographic memory for faces and bead codes
dreams: Ascend to tide-seat within House Kelvar
Privatize a wing of the River Market
Secretly open an independent counting room free of clan strings
secrets: Brokered coin-blank molds through a foundry foreman
Owes the Night Orchard for silencing a loan-default scandal
Keeps a duplicate key to the Chainbridge mid-span records hatch
